title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat the eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta and mix quickly with eggs and bacon.
Serve with black pepper on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Cook tomato sauce in a pan and add cream.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer.
